definition[0]: the small amount of light in the sky as the day ends
example[0]: The end of the cigarette glowed in the twilight.
definition[1]: the time when day is just starting to become night
example[1]: romantic walks along the beach at twilight
definition[2]: the period just before the end of the most active part of someoneâ€™s life
example[2]: Depression in the twilight years  (=the last years of your life) is usually related to illness.
